function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Older buildings may lack advanced automation and control systems, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission due to inadequate control and monitoring of indoor environmental conditions.","Mitigation":"Retrofit older buildings with modern automation and control systems to enhance indoor environmental monitoring and control.","Technologies":"Advanced building automation and control systems (BACS), energy management systems (EMS), indoor sensors.","People":"Occupants, healthcare staff, visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management."},{"Description":"Retrofitting measures may prioritize envelope-targeting instead of building system functionalities, impacting disease control measures.","Impact":"Missed opportunity to enhance disease control through advanced building system functionalities.","Mitigation":"Prioritize retrofitting measures that enhance building system functionalities, such as EMS, indoor sensors, and submeters.","Technologies":"Energy management systems (EMS), indoor sensors, submeters.","People":"Building owners, facility management, healthcare staff.","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare facility administrators."}]}
